title: install doc refers to spurious N
body:
by **damien@grassart.com**: 
The install.html doc mentions "where N is a number that varies from release to
release", but there is no N to reference in the build output. I believe the line
"N known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs" is missing above "ALL TEST PASS".

Thanks,
-Damien
Attachments: 1. n_known_bugs.diff (241 bytes)
